casebody.data:
CAROLINA FIRST BANK
v.
STARK. No. 369P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Stark. Mark P. Henriques, Sarah Motley, Charlotte, for Carolina First Bank.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of August 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
